nbttag: {"id":"minecraft:golden_helmet","count":1,"components":{"minecraft:custom_name":"{\"text\":\"Potato Crown\",\"color\":\"gold\"}","minecraft:lore":["{\"text\":\"\",\"extra\":[{\"text\":\"Speed: \",\"color\":\"gray\"},{\"text\":\"+1\",\"color\":\"green\"}]}","{\"text\":\"\"}","{\"text\":\"Ability: Potato King\",\"color\":\"gold\"}","{\"text\":\"Bestowed by Hypixel to the\",\"color\":\"gray\"}","{\"text\":\"winner of the Great Potato War.\",\"color\":\"gray\"}","{\"text\":\"\"}","{\"text\":\"All men can see the tactics\",\"color\":\"light_purple\"}","{\"text\":\"whereby I conquer, but what none\",\"color\":\"light_purple\"}","{\"text\":\"can see is the strategy out \",\"color\":\"light_purple\"}","{\"text\":\"which victory is evolved.\",\"color\":\"light_purple\"}","{\"text\":\"- Sun Tzu, The Art of War\",\"color\":\"dark_gray\"}","{\"text\":\"\"}","{\"text\":\"This item can be reforged!\",\"color\":\"dark_gray\"}","{\"text\":\"LEGENDARY HELMET\",\"color\":\"gold\",\"bold\":true}"],"minecraft:custom_data":{"id":"POTATO_CROWN"},"minecraft:hide_additional_tooltip":{}}}
